confirmed_facts: Pope Leo 14 will travel from 27 November to 2 December 2025.
The itinerary includes visits to Ankara, Istanbul, Iznik, and Lebanon.
He will meet Turkish President Recep Tayyip ErdoÄŸan and Lebanese President Joseph Aoun.
Pope Leo 14 will attend the 1,700th anniversary of the First Council of Nicaea in Iznik.
He will hold a mass at the Volkswagen Arena in Istanbul.
Pope Leo 14 will visit the tomb of Maronite saint Charbel Makhluf and the Marian statue on Harissa Hill in Lebanon.

timeline.event: Arrival in Ankara; visit to Ataturk's mausoleum; meeting with President ErdoÄŸan.
Visit to St. Mary's Cathedral in Istanbul; pilgrimage to Iznik; attendance at 1,700th anniversary of the First Council of Nicaea.
Visit to Sultan Ahmed Mosque; mass at Volkswagen Arena.
Visit to Armenian Apostolic Church; end of Turkish leg; departure for Lebanon.
Memorial for the 2020 Beirut port explosion; meeting with President Joseph Aoun.
Visit to Charbel Makhluf's tomb and the Marian statue on Harissa Hill; conclusion of the sixâ€‘day trip.
